Header: PM issues statement to mark World Children’s and Elders’ Day
Content: Issuing a statement in line with World Children’s and Elders’ Day, Prime Minister Ranil Wickremesinghe has said that one must not forget that what the country has achieved is a result of the dedication of our elders. He said that in comparison to other nations, Sri Lankans should ensure that our heritage of respecting and caring for our elders continues.
